intent.user_query: What are the top 3 customers with the highest total purchase amount?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT TOP 3 CustomerID, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalPurchaseAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY TotalPurchaseAmount DESC;

arguments.sql: SELECT TOP 3 CustomerID, SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalPurchaseAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales GROUP BY CustomerID ORDER BY TotalPurchaseAmount DESC;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
